title: The 5 coolest things about the Canyon Aeroad of Alpecin-Deceuninck and Tour de France stage winner Jasper Philipsen
content:
Mathieu van der Poel’s custom white bike is cool and all, but you can’t beat this purple.

Read the full article at The 5 coolest things about the Canyon Aeroad of Alpecin-Deceuninck and Tour de France stage winner Jasper Philipsen on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
